full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGE SGRUB PA GNYER PA BSTAN PA YAR 'PHEL GYIS STOBS BZHI'I BSHAGS PA BSDAMS BYED TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA MKHAN PO BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYI DGE SGRUB PA GNYER BA BSTAN PA YAR 'PHEL GYIS STOBS BZHI'I BSHAGS BSDAMS BYED TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA 'DI'I MTSAN NI ZLA BA'I 'OD ZER CAN ZHES BYA'O, ,)
